response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $150 by myself. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that truly stands out. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs and preferences.", "product_price": 120}
